aboutCity.title: Data Scientist Course in Chennai
aboutCity.desc: Chennai is a vibrant and bustling metropolis in southern India. It is a major hub for technology and innovation, hosting numerous tech companies and startups. The city offers a unique blend of modernity and tradition, with a diverse cultural landscape, exquisite cuisine, and a pleasant climate. Chennai is also renowned for its lush parks, educational institutions, and a thriving arts and music scene, making it a dynamic and sought-after destination for professionals and visitors alike.

Module0.title: Data Science Course in Chennai with Microsoft Certificate

desc: This data science course in Chennai  comes with added certifications - Microsoft Certification and A Real-time work experience certificate awarded to you by companies for working on actual data science projects. The contents in the syllabus of this data science course in Chennai are curated by industry experts covering all the bases of data science topics from basic introductory programming to Python, Applied Statistics, Power BI, SQL, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, data science tools and more.

And there’s more, this data science course in Chennai, by Skillslash offers guaranteed job referrals to help you connect with MNCs and startups. All the mentioned incentives of the data science course in Chennai can be availed by everyone: graduates, freshers, professionals looking to transition and upskill.

Module0.title: Is there scope for data science in Chennai ?

desc: Data science is a popular and growing field that has managed to open up a whole area of new opportunities and jobs all over the world and is no different for Chennai.

Chennai is one of the 3rd of the IT hubs in India; And, in being so the city is flowing with demand for data science with the ever-growing IT landscape. This demand for data science in turn leads to multiple opportunities for you to find your place, your job, your data science career in Chennai.
This Skillslash’s data science course in Chennai is designed to fill the growing need for data science professionals by companies in Chennai.

Skillslash’s Data science course in Chennai will help you greatly, as this data science course in Chennai not only gives you a strong data science knowledge, but allows you to work on actual data science projects with companies and earn a real-time work experience certification for the same.
Furthermore, this data science course in Chennai is the perfect choice for aspiring data scientist as, this course has:
1. An all-inclusive course curriculum created by industry experts .
3. Real-time work experience pushes you to work on actual real time projects for companies and earn a real-time work experience certification for the same.
4. Backing you with a beneficial Microsoft Certification after completing the Data Science Course in Chennai

Module0.title: What are the benefits of the Skillslash data science course in Chennai ?

desc: Recruiters in companies are looking at candidates and applications with a strong data science background, practical experience and work experience before choosing their data scientists and employees.
And this is where Skillslash’s Data science course in Chennai will help you greatly.
Here’s how this data science course in Chennai aims to help you in your data science career :
1. An all-inclusive course curriculum created by industry experts
3. Real-time work experience pushes you to work on actual real time projects for companies and earn a real-time work experience certification for the same.
4. Backing you with a beneficial Microsoft Certification after completing the data science course in Chennai

Module0.title: What Course plans are available for the data science course in Chennai ?

desc: Currently, we at Skillslash offers specialization courses in the advanced data science and AI course and the Business Analytics course for professionals.
Both these curriculum courses are made available to you with two Program plans:

The Pro Plan: This plan is placed at a cost of IN 65,000 (without GST) and gives you a 1 year live class subscription and a 2 year subscription to our Learning Management system dashboard, accompanied with 7+ industry projects and 1 capstone project.

The Pro Max Plan:  This plan is placed at a cost of INR 1,20,000 (without GST) and comes with multiple benefits that include: job assistance, 4 year live class subscription, lifetime access to our learning dashboard, unlimited job referrals, 15+ industry projects, 3 capstone projects, 2 domain training, 6 months project certification from companies and a microsoft certification.
* Both these plans come with monthly EMI options and scholarship options. *

Module0.title: What is the Data science course duration in Chennai ?

desc: This Data Science course in Chennai is an online data science training platform that can last between 5 - 8 months to 3 years in terms of your pace of learning and access to the course dashboard.

With this course being an online study program for individuals from all over the nation to be able to access, it is curated to be a self-paced learning course curriculum meaning one can finish the course at their own speed with no rush, while keeping up with work and other commitments.

Module0.title: What are the different domain projects included in this course ?

desc: This data science course in Chennai offers you an opportunity to work on 10+ industry-partnered capstone projects in over 6+ domains, while practicing with 20+ tools.

chap.title: BFSI Domain
desc: 1. Predicting credit default: (Analyze a customer’s financial records, such as credit line number, age, payment history, and past 6 months’ delinquency history to forecast the likelihood of the customer’s default on future payments. )
2. Foreign currency exchange rate prediction:(Predicting foreign currency exchange rates to make informed decisions in international financial transactions. )

3. Fraud detection for online/mobile banking services: (You will implement advanced machine learning algorithms and anomaly detection  techniques to identify and prevent fraudulent activities that ensure the trust of customer’s financial transactions. )

chap.title: Healthcare
desc: 1. Heart disease prediction: (You will build a reliable machine learning model for predicting the risks of heart diseases on the basis of patient’s data, to aid early diagnosis and timely medical treatments. )

2. Google Mobility data prediction: ( You will use historial Google mobility data, leveraging machine learning algorithms and statistical models to analyze future mobility patterns for insights into disease trends and behaviors. )

chap.title: Retail & Ecommerce
desc: 1. Recommender Systems :(Here, you learn to enhance customer experience for your organization and further your company’s engagement statistics)
And more in HR, Marketing and Commerce fields for you to explore with us at Skillslash through this data science course in Chennai.

Module0.title: What sets Skillslash’s data science course in Chennai apart from the others ?

desc: There are multiple options of data science courses in Chennai available to you with the simple click of a mouse.
So, why should you choose Skillslash’s data science course in Chennai ?

Why because, Skillslash offers you the golden opportunity to gain actual work experience on actual company projects and earn a real-time work experience certificate for the same, Plus, we at Skillslash offer top notch hands-on training and learning, with industry experts and importance to practical experience to help you navigate the real world.
And there’s more, This data science course in Chennai offers a Microsoft certification and guaranteed job referrals to help you connect and create your careers in major MNCs and startups

Module0.title: What is different about Skillslash’s Data Science Course in Chennai ?

desc: When it comes to choosing data science courses, there are so many options available to you with a simple tap of a key, then why should you choose Skillslash, why choose this data science course in Chennai ?

You choose Skillslash’s data science course in Chennai because we provide you with everything- from theory to practical to further aid in jobs and placements. As this data science course is designed specially to equip you with the data science skills and content knowledge with practical experience that will get you a job in the data science job market.
Throughout this data science course in Chennai we equip you with multiple instruments to help speed up your job placement process, these include :
- Real-time work experience & Real-time Work Experience Certification
- Lifetime access to course dashboards for you to come back and refresh your knowledge anytime.

Module0.title: Module 0
Module0.descS: Our courses start off with this module that offers a basic overview of programming in data science for both beginners and advanced users who wish to strengthen their fundamental skills.

chap.title: Chapter 1: Introduction to Programming ( 3 hrs )
desc: Source code Vs bytecode Vs machine code, Compiler Vs Interpreter, C/C++, Java Vs Python.

chap.title: Chapter 2: code editors basics (1 hrs)
desc: Different type of code editors in python, Introduction to Anaconda and IDEs

chap.title: Chapter 3: python basics (1 hrs)
desc: Variable Vs Identifiers, Strings Operators Vs Operand, Procedure oriented Vs Modular programming.

chap.title: Chapter 4: statistics basics & probability (1 hrs)
desc: Measures of Central Tendency & dispersion, Inferential statistics and Sampling theory.

Module0.title: Module 1
Module0.descS: Through a hands-on approach, you will learn key programming concepts of Python, MatplotLib, Seaborn and languages commonly used in the data science field. Whether you're aspiring to become a data scientist or simply seeking to harness the power of programming for data analysis, this module equips you with the essential skills to manipulate, analyze, and visualize data effectively.

chap.title: Chapter 2: PYTHON INTRODUCTION (1 hrs)
desc: How a Python Program runs on our system?
Features of Python Memory Management in Python,

chap.title: Chapter 6: EXPECTION HANDELING
desc: Nestedtry-except block & Default except for block.

chap.title: Chapter 7: MODULES IN PYTHON
desc: Importing Modules and different import statement

chap.title: Chapter 8: FILE HANDELING
desc: Why do we need File Handling?

chap.title: Chapter 10: NUMPY IN PYTHON
desc: Intro & use of numpy, What is an array?

chap.title: Chapter 11: PANDAS IN PYTHON
desc: Exporting Dataframe to CSV and Excel

chap.title: Chapter 13: Seaborn
desc: Working with seaborn on titanic dataset

Module0.title: Module 2
Module0.descS: By the end of the module, you will have mastered statistical tools such as probabilistic theory, hypothesis testing and regression analysis, all in the context of practical data science applications and the knowledge they need to be at the forefront of data science and lead data-driven innovations.

chap.title: Chapter 1:- Probability theory and Statistical Inferences ( 4 hrs )
desc: Discrete Probability Distributions - Binomial, Poisson etc
Continuous Probability Distributions - Gaussian, Normal, etc

chap.title: Chapter 2: Statistics Foundations (1 hrs)
desc: Measures of Central tendency and Dispersion
Sampling theory and scales of measurement

chap.title: Chapter 3: Hypothesis Testing and its Applications (1 hrs)
desc: Basic Concepts - Formulation of Hypothesis, Making a decision
Advanced Concepts - Choice of Test - t test vs z test
Evaluation of Test - P value and Critical Value approach

chap.title: Chapter 4: Exploratory Data Analysis and the Art of Storytelling (1 hrs)

Module0.title: Module 3
Module0.descS: Explore cutting-edge algorithms, model optimization, and deep learning architectures, all while gaining practical experience through hands-on projects.

chap.title: Chapter 1:A primer on Machine Learning ( 3 hrs )
desc: Types of Learning - Supervised, Unsupervised and Reinforcement
Types of Analysis - Descriptive, Predictive, and Prescriptive
Bias Variance Tradeoff - Overfitting vs Underfitting

chap.title: Chapter 2: Regression
desc: What is linear in Linear Regression?
Model Evaluation Metrics for regression problems - MAE, RMSE, MSE, and MAP

chap.title: Chapter 3: Classification
desc: Up sampling, Down sampling and SMOTE

chap.title: Chapter 4: Clustering-K means
desc: K Means Algorithms - Partition based model for clustering

chap.title: Chapter 5: KNN
desc: Non-Parametric algorithms and Lazy learning ideology
Applications in Missing value imputes and Balancing datasets

chap.title: Chapter 7: Decision Trees
desc: Why are they called Greedy Algorithms?

chap.title: Chapter 8: Ensemble Techniques
desc: Introduction to Bagging as an Ensemble technique
Bootstrap Aggregation and Out of Bag error
Random Forests and its Applications in Feature selection
How Bagging overcomes the overfitting problem?
How Boosting overcomes the Bias - Variance Tradeoff
Gradient Boosting and Xgboost as regularised boosting

chap.title: Chapter 11: Time-series Analysis
desc: The Random Walk model and Stationarity of Time Series
Tests for Stationarity - ADF and Dickey- Fuller test, AR, MA, ARIMA, SARIMA models
A regression approach to time series forecasting.

chap.title: Chapter 12: Machine Learning Pipeline & auto ML
desc: Serving the model via Rest API & Keras.

Module0.title: Module 4
Module0.descS: Gain the skills and knowledge you need to make the most of deep learning for everything from image recognition to natural language processing and predictive modeling. Get to know the ins and outs of AI, deep learning, CNNs, RNNs, and other cutting-edge techniques.

chap.title: Chapter 3: Deep Neural Networks
desc: Tools for deep learning models - Tflearn and Pytorch
The problem of Exploding and Vanishing gradients

chap.title: Chapter 4: Convolutional Neural networks
desc: Architecture and design of a Convolutional network,

chap.title: Chapter 5: Recurrent Neural networks and LSTMs.
desc: RN N & LSTM structure, Bidirectional RNNs and Applications on Sequential data
Advanced Time series forecasting using RNNs with LSTMs

chap.title: Chapter 6: Restricted Boltzmann Machines and Autoencoders.
desc: Application of RBMs in Collaborative filtering

Module0.title: Module 5
Module0.descS: This module will help you figure out the ins and outs of text data. You'll learn the basics of analyzing, manipulating, and extracting meaning from text, so you can create smart apps, make decisions based on data, and improve your data science abilities.

chap.title: Chapter 1:- Language modelling
desc: N-gram Language models: Perplexity and Smoothing
Introduction to Hidden Markov models, Viterbi algorithms
MEMMs and CRFs for named entity recognition
Application of LSTMs to predict the next word.

chap.title: Chapter 3: Sequence to Sequence tasks
desc: NLP with machine translation for text analysis
How to implement a conversational Chatbot

chap.title: Chapter 4: Capstone Project
desc: backend and  deployment process for chatbot

Module0.title: Module 6
Module0.descS: Discover the exciting world of Reinforcement Learning (RL) in the context of Data Science. In this module, you will delve into the fundamentals of RL, a powerful machine learning paradigm that enables algorithms to make sequential decisions by learning from their interactions with the environment.

desc: The multi-armed bandit problem and the explore-exploit dilemma
Approximation Methods (i.e., how to plug in a deep neural network or other differentiable model into your RL algorithm)

Module0.title: Module 7
Module0.descS: Whether you're interested in object detection, image classification, facial recognition, or the countless other applications of Computer Vision, this module will equip you with the knowledge and skills to tackle real-world data challenges and unlock the potential of visual data in the field of data science.

desc: R-CNN and RetinaNet models for Object detection using Tensorflow
IoU and Dice score for model evaluation

Module0.title: Module 8
Module0.title1: Data Structures and Algorithms ( 12 Weeks ) (only in Pro Max)
Module0.descS: From understanding the significance of data structures to mastering algorithmic problem-solving, this module equips you with the critical skills needed to excel in the field of data science. You will be solving 250+ coding challenges under guidance of expert mentors working in Tier 1 companies like Microsoft, Amazon, Adobe, Facebook, Google etc.

desc: Array basics, Problem solving techniques with example

chap.title: Note
desc: Total Number of problems to be solved in live class: 120+

Module0.title: Module 9
Module0.descS: Unlock the full potential of data science with our comprehensive module on essential tools: Excel, SQL, Tableau, and Power BI and more. Dive into the world of data manipulation, analysis, visualization, and reporting with hands-on training in these industry-standard applications.

chap.title: Chapter 1: Excel Fundamentals
desc: Excel Toolbars: Hiding, Displaying, and Moving Toolbars.
Switching Between Sheets in a Workbook.
Hiding and Unhiding Columns, Rows and Sheets.
Opening, saving and closing Excel document.

chap.title: Chapter 2: Worksheet Customization
desc: Creating Headers, Footers, and Page Numbers.
Adjusting Row Height and Column Width.
Moving and Copying Data in an Excel Worksheet.
Inserting and Deleting Rows and Columns.

chap.title: Chapter 3: Images and Shapes into Excel Worksheet
Chapter 4: Basic work on Excel
desc: Entering and selecting values. Using numeric data in excel
Working with forms menu, cell references, conditional
Finding and replacing information from worksheet
Inserting & deleting cells, rows and columns.

chap.title: Chapter 5: Excel Formulae
desc: Im plementing excel formulae in worksheet
Relative vs Absol ute cell references in formulae
Entering and Editing text, Fixing errors in your formulae
Formulae with several operators, Formulae with cell ranges

chap.title: Chapter 6: Excel Functions
desc: Working with functions like SUM(), AVERAGE() etc
Adjacent cells error in excel calculations

chap.title: Chapter 7: Working with Charts and Graphs
desc: Working with the excel chart ribbon.
Adding and modifying data on an Excel chart.
Moving a chart to another worksheet.
Adding titles, gridlines and a data table.
Formatting a data series and chart axis.
Changing a chart type and working with pie charts.

chap.title: Chapter 8: Support Vector Machines
desc: Structuring Source Data for Analysis in Excel
Exploring Pivot Ta ble Analyse & Desig n Options
Working with and on pivot tables
Enriching data with Pivot table calculated values & fields

chap.title: Chapter 9: Basic Macros
desc: Assigning a Macro a Shortcut Key.

chap.title: Chapter 10: Introduction to SQL
desc: All about SQL Difference between SQL & MongoDB.
Different Structured Query languages Why MySQL?

chap.title: Chapter 16: JOINS & Functions
desc: Usage of different types of JOINS
Usage of string functions like; CONCAT, SUBSTRING etc
OUTER join, Full join, Left Join, Right Join, UNION.

chap.title: Chapter 17: Advance SQL
desc: Timestamps and Extract, CURRENT DATE & TIME, EXTRACT
AGE, TO_CHAR, Mathematical Functions and Operators
ROUND, SETSEED, Operators and their precedence.

chap.title: Chapter 19: Mongo DB
desc: What are Object Ids in MongoDb.

chap.title: Chapter 20: Introduction To Tableau
desc: Different charts on TABLEAU (Bar graphs, Line graphs, Scatter graphs, Crosstabs, Histogram, Heatmap, Tree maps, Bullet graphs, etc.)

chap.title: Chapter 21: Data Types in Tableau
desc: Adding a second layer moving average.

chap.title: Chapter 22: Mapping and Analytics
desc: Creating a map, working with hierarchies.
Image Creating a Scatter Plot, Applying Filters to Multiple Worksheets.

chap.title: Chapter 23: Calculations
desc: level of detail common calculation functions

chap.title: Chapter 24: Dashboard and Stories
desc: Working in views with Dashboard and stories

chap.title: Chapter 25: Introducation To Power BI
desc: Understanding the Power BI Desktop Workflow.
Exploring the Interface of the Data Model.

chap.title: Chapter 26: Query Editor
desc: Connecting Power BI Desktop to Source Files.

chap.title: Chapter 27: Power BI
desc: Working with Time series Understanding aggregation and granularity
Filters and Slicers in Power BI

chap.title: Chapter 28: Data Models
desc: SUM, AVERAGE, MIN, MAX, SUMX, COUNT, DIVIDE, COUNT, COUNTROOMS, CALCULATE, FILTER, ALL

chap.title: Chapter 29: Time Intelligence
desc: Create data table in M and DAX, Display last refresh Date.

AboutCourseHeading.heading: About Data Science
AboutCourseHeading.para: Data science is a field that combines statistical analysis, programming, and domain expertise to extract insights from data. A data scientist is a professional who uses a combination of statistical and programming skills to extract insights from data, and often works with data in a business or organizational setting. They typically have a strong background in mathematics and computer science, as well as experience in fields such as statistics and machine learning. They use this knowledge to analyze and interpret complex data sets, and use their findings to inform business decisions and drive growth.

data.heading: What is Data Science? And, who is a Data Scientist?
data.para: Data science is a field that combines statistical analysis, programming, and domain expertise to extract insights from data. A data scientist is a professional who uses a combination of statistical and programming skills to extract insights from data, and often works with data in a business or organizational setting. They typically have a strong background in mathematics and computer science, as well as experience in fields such as statistics and machine learning. They use this knowledge to analyze and interpret complex data sets, and use their findings to inform business decisions and drive growth. Enrolling in our Data Science Course Training in Chennai is the perfect first step towards a career in data science. Our program is designed to provide you with a comprehensive understanding of the principles of data science, as well as the hands-on experience you'll need to succeed in the field. During the data science course, you'll learn from industry professionals in live-interactive sessions, giving you the opportunity to ask questions and get personalized feedback. This will allow you to fully understand the concepts and techniques you're learning and to apply them to real-world problems.
data.para1: Additionally, our data science program includes a unique opportunity to work on projects with top-tier industry collaborators. This will give you the chance to gain valuable experience working on real-world projects, which will be highly beneficial when applying for jobs. And, to top it off, we guarantee a job referral to all our successful graduates, giving you the best Data Science training institute in Chennai.

data.heading: How does Skillslash offer the best Data Science training institute in Chennai?
data.para: If you're looking for top-notch Data Science training institutes in Chennai, Skillslash is an excellent choice.One of the biggest advantages of choosing Skillslash’s data science course is that all of our classes are 100% live and interactive. This means that you'll be able to get your doubts cleared in real-time by industry experts who are mentoring you through the data science course, having more than a decade of experience. These mentors come from top companies like Google, Microsoft, TCS, Amazon, Flipkart, Myntra and Capegemini and have proven their mettle in their respective fields. Another advantage of choosing Skillslash’s data science course is that you'll have the opportunity to work with AI companies as an intern. This will give you real-world experience by working on 8+ industry-specific projects. And upon completion of the data science program, you'll even receive project certification from the company to boost your CV.
data.para1: Skillslash also makes it easy and affordable for you to finance your education. We offer easy financing options including an EMI system, so you don't have to worry about the financial burden of the data science course. Finally, our team provides resume preparation training and mock interviews, and we also provide job referrals to help you get placed in a top company after completing the data science course. We offer a comprehensive, industry-relevant training program that will give you the skills and experience you need to excel in the field of data science. With live interactive classes, industry expert mentors, real-world experience, easy financing options, and job placement assistance, Skillslash is an excellent choice for anyone looking to start a career in data science.

data.heading: Why One Should Take The Data Science Course? Is Data Science certification being worth pursuing as a career?
data.para: Data science is a highly valuable and in-demand field, and taking a Data science Course can help individuals gain the skills and knowledge needed to pursue a career in this field. The course would provide an introduction to the key concepts and tools used in data science, such as programming languages, statistical analysis, and machine learning, as well as hands-on experience working with data. The course could also help individuals understand the business applications of data science and how data can be used to inform decision making.
data.para1: Regarding Data Science certification online training in Chennai, it depends on the individual's career goals and the specific certification program. Generally, a data science certification can demonstrate that an individual has a certain level of knowledge and skills in the field, which can be helpful for job applicants or those looking to advance their careers. However, it's important to note that a certification alone may not guarantee a job or a promotion, and employers will also look at an individual's experience and portfolio of work. Therefore, it's worth pursuing a data science certification if it aligns with your career goals and you are willing to put in the time and effort to earn it.

FAQ.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.desc: Go through the FAQ’s to know more about our Data Science course in Chennai with unlimited job referrals, course fees and project details.

FaqDATA.ques: Can freshers choose to do this data science course in Chennai ? ?
FaqDATA.ans: Yes, freshers can enroll in this data science course in Chennai. As this data science course in Chennai is open to all levels of experience and backgrounds

FaqDATA.ques: What are the different learning alternatives available for Data Science course ?
FaqDATA.ansAfter: One of the most important features of our data science course is the emphasis on real-world experience. We provide a live interactive learning option including blended learning curriculum tailored to the needs of working professionals. In addition, the data science course includes live online sessions in hybrid learning mode and hands-on work on industrial projects. This allows for real-time communication with instructors, as well as practical sessions in data science, artificial intelligence, and machine learning.

FaqDATA.ques: If I have to miss a lesson in data science training due to an emergency, would there be a make-up class available to cover our data science syllabus?
FaqDATA.ans: For starters, their Data Science course in Chennai includes live online sessions. Additionally, all of their students have access to video recordings of those classes. Furthermore, they provide you with unrestricted access to these recorded sessions so that you may refer to them anytime you need theoretical assistance in your AI and ML career. As a consequence, you won't be disappointed if you miss any of our artificial intelligence and machine learning training's live sessions. They do, however, strongly suggest you attend all live sessions.

FaqDATA.ques: What is the Data Science Course Scholarship Program at Skillslash?
FaqDATA.ansAfter: Course Scholarship Program at Skillslash offers students the opportunity to earn a reduced course fee. Each candidate will have the chance to complete a 20-minute online aptitude test. If a candidate scores more than 65 percent on the aptitude exam, they will be eligible for a 10% reduction in data science course costs. Furthermore, applicants who lost their employment as a result of the COVID scenario, as well as mothers who wish to start a profession, may be eligible for a scholarship of up to 100% based on their exam score. This  data science program is designed to make our Data Science course more accessible and affordable for a diverse range of students.

FaqDATA.ques: For How long does this data science course in Chennai last?
FaqDATA.ans: Skillslash's data science course in Chennai being an online learning platform offers you data science course access subscriptions that last from 1 year with the Pro plan and up to 3 years with the Pro Max plan and you can grab a lifetime access with our Pro Max plan.

FaqDATA.ques: Will the data scientist certification in Chennai take place online or in a classroom?
FaqDATA.ans: At present, Skillslash offering online data science certification programs with 100% live interactive sessions to make your learning journey truly unforgettable. Our live sessions provide real-time doubt clearance, so you won't miss out on the benefits of a physical setting where you can communicate and get your questions answered quickly.

FaqDATA.ques: What is Skillslash’s Data Science scholarship program in Chennai?
FaqDATA.ans: Skillslash's Data Science scholarship program in Chennai is designed to provide financial assistance for students who want to take our Data Science course but may face financial barriers. Candidates who pass the aptitude test with a score of more than 65 percent will be eligible for a 30 percent discount on the data science course fees. Additionally, candidates who lost their jobs as a result of the COVID situation, as well as mothers who want to begin their careers, can receive up to a 100% scholarship based on their exam score. This data science program is an excellent opportunity for students who are looking to gain knowledge and skills in the field of Data Science.

FaqDATA.ques: Are there any fee discounts available for Data Science training in Chennai?
FaqDATA.ans: Yes, we offer fee discounts for our Data Science training in Chennai. Eligible students can save up to 30% on their data science course fees. Additionally, we also offer scholarships to Covid-affected candidates, unemployed candidates, and mothers returning to the workforce after a vacation. These discounts and scholarships are designed to make our data science course more accessible and affordable for a diverse range of students.

FaqDATA.ques: What are the topics covered in this data science course in Chennai ?
FaqDATA.ans: This data science course in Chennai covers all the areas from basics to advanced data science tools and their applications. This course in Chennai, by Skillslash covers basic programming of Python, applied statistics, machine learning, NLP, deep learning, Data science tools, Power BI and everything one needs to know to succeed as a data scientist. .

FaqDATA.ques: What are the companies that hire data science professionals ?
FaqDATA.ans: Many companies from big MNCs to recent startups and corporate companies in Chennai and all around the globe hire data science professionals, which include: Google,  Amazon, Microsoft,  Facebook, Apple, IBM, Netflix, Uber, Airbnb, LinkedIn, Twitter, Salesforce,  Adobe and more .

FaqDATA.ques: How much can I expect to earn as a data scientist?
FaqDATA.ans: If you're an individual searching for a Data Scientist job in the city of Chennai , the pay will range from in between INR 8 to INR 17 lakhs with an approximate average annual salary of up to INR 1.5 Lakhs yearly, great packages for you to lead a happy and comfortable life .

FaqDATA.ques: Are your data science course training sessions live or pre-recorded?
FaqDATA.ans: All of our data science course training sessions are conducted live, in real-time, with an experienced instructor leading the way. These data science sessions are designed to be interactive, allowing participants to engage with the material and ask questions as they arise.You'll log in at a specific time and join a virtual classroom where you'll be able to connect with other participants and our data science trainers. This allows for a collaborative learning environment where everyone can share their experiences and insights.And don't worry if you miss a data science session or need to review the material again, we understand that everyone learns at a different pace. That's why we record all of our data sience sessions and make them available to you after the fact. This way, you'll have the opportunity to revisit the material, reinforce your understanding, and make sure you're keeping up with the rest of the data science class. So, whether you're a visual, auditory, or kinesthetic learner, we've got you covered.

FaqDATA.ques: What kind of certification does the Data Science course in Chennai provide?
FaqDATA.ans: The Data Science course in Chennai provides a globally recognized project management certification. Upon completion of the data science course, students will not only gain a solid understanding of data science, artificial intelligence, and machine learning but also receive a globally recognized project management certificate. Furthermore, the company with which you completed your industrial project can also give you direct certification, which is a valuable asset in the job market. This certification is a testament to the quality of our course and the skills and knowledge that students will gain during the course.
